long_description: Protect your tent's floor from damage by rocks or roots and keep the bottom clean for packing with this floor saver. Constructed of heavy-duty polyethylene so it acts as an added shield from water. Sized a bit smaller than tent floor in order to prevent water from collecting under tent. Overall dimensions: 4' 9" x 6' 8".
short_description: Protect your tent's floor from damage by rocks or roots and keep the bottom clean for packing with this floor saver.
